Our monthly employee newsletter with company updates and announcements -----
December 2021 Edition

Welcome to the Latest Edition of 
The Justia Insider

As we approach the end of this year, we want to thank you all for your hard work and dedication; we know that the best is yet to come. But first and foremost, stay safe! On behalf of The Insider Team, Happy Holidays! May these days be merry and bright, wishing you and yours a happy, healthy holiday season.

Milestones & Accomplishments

Let’s Find Out What’s Been Achieved So Far by Our Teams at Justia

JLD Database Upgrade: We managed to update this database with minimum downtime impact to the Justia Lawyer Directory.

IT Maintenance and Upgrades: Our IT Team keeps our servers high-performing and upgraded. This month, we upgraded and migrated the Verdict WordPress installation, the NodeJS server where we run screenshots for our client websites and AMP tests, and the NDV server used for internal development.

Regulations: The quarterly state regulations update took place this month. We are transitioning to a better source in partnership with FastCase, ready for the next release.

QA Automation: Our QA Team released automated QA jobs for both quarterly state regulations updates and Oyez.

Updated all WordPress Installations: We upgraded all our Client and Justia WordPress installations (including Elevate) with the latest security patches available.

Amplify Reports: This month, we finished with delayed LSA charges for two months. This adjustment is now reflected on the internal accounting report as well as the Amplify client reports.

State Codes 2021: Even though we are very close to finishing with the 2020 versions of our State Codes, we started early with the 2021 versions for the states of Iowa and Kentucky.

In Memoriam

“There are no goodbyes for us. Wherever you are, you will always be in my heart.” - Mahatma Gandhi

JUSTIA PORTAL NEWS

Take a Look at the Ongoing Development of Our Consumer Portal
  • Case Outlines for Law Students: We are improving the usefulness of our portal for legal academia by providing descriptions of key cases in core law school courses, such as Torts, Criminal Law, Civil Procedure, Property, and Contracts. The outlines will provide links to the cases on Justia.
  • Products Liability Center: We are enhancing the accessibility of our content on this technical topic by adding informational boxes that highlight important points.
  • Onward Spotlights: We are using Onward blog posts to call attention to some of our more broadly relevant portal centers, such as DUI and Employment Law. Each post imagines how a consumer facing specific legal issues would use the content in the center to learn about the law.

Reminders

Stay Safe During the HolidaysWith new variants of COVID-19 spiking worldwide, minimizing infection risks over the holiday season is more important than ever. For this upcoming holiday season, make sure to adapt and adjust when

gathering and socializing. The following pieces of advice may help you and your family stay safe: wear a mask at all times, keep your distance, organize smaller gatherings, plan ahead to avoid crowds, and, if possible, shop online.

TEAM ACTIVITY

Virtual Just meet up!

After a lengthy break due to the pandemic, we held our first Virtual Just Meet Up! titled “Tips for a Successful Job Search in Times of The Pandemic.” Hector Lugo addressed how recent graduates could go about finding a job or an internship opportunity in these difficult times. Jorge Contreras and Daniel Gomez also participated in sharing some tips.

REVIEWS & RECOMMENDATIONS

Top 10 Netflix Documentaries For Graphic Designers

Available on Netflix

"Generating ideas and solutions in the creative world is essential; several techniques such as brainstorming, mind mapping, storyboarding, and others definitely help. Additionally, content on the Internet provides innovative ideas, such as in the case of Netflix. The platform broadcasts documentaries aimed at artists, designers, photographers, creatives, and anyone willing to boost their creativity. I recommend reading

this article; you will find valuable suggestions in those documentaries to get some of the best ideas and inspiration while taking a break."

- Claudia Duque
